spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.description: -6 to an ability score; -4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

spells.name: Defile Armor
spells.description: As sanctify armor, but gain DR 5/good when using judgment or smite.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Cancels one magical spell or effect.

spells.name: Magic Circle against Good/Law
spells.description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

spells.name: Summon Monster III
spells.description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.description: Touch deals 1d6 damage/2 levels; caster gains damage as temporary hp.
